# init(width:height:)

**Initializer**

Creates a caption size with width and height values.

## Declaration

```swift
init(width: AVCaptionDimension, height: AVCaptionDimension)
```

## Parameters

- **width**: The caption width.
- **height**: The caption height.
title: init(width:height:)
